items.name: jsx
items.description: jsx module let you to describe programmaticaly jsx templates with the advantage of virtual dom diff.

items.name: stream
items.description: A function that debounce dom events and returns them as a list of events to be mapped.

items.name: logger
items.description: Logger module helps you to visualize all the subscriptions and publishing events and also to easily track your Jails application mistakes from Jails workflow perspective.

items.name: routr
items.description: An improved Router for your applications, simple calls, more faster then Router and standalone. It was created after observations on the regular Router usage, so has the same advantages but and better written.

items.name: storage
items.description: This AMD module has the simplest way to use the localStorage and sessionStorage objects, very useful to persist data on client side.

items.name: cookies
items.description: Just a simple cookie wrapper to deal with document.cookie property.

items.name: litestore
items.description: A very light and simple implementation of a store using one directional flow.
